titleStmt.title: SII 14.240: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 240. (A.R. No. 474 of 1916.) TEN TIRUPPUVANAM, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE PUSHPAVANĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This record dated in the 17th year of the king registers a gift of sheep by Kiḻavaṉ Appaṉ alias Śrīvallabha-Pāṇḍyakkōṉ of Koṟkai in Kuḍa-nāḍu for burning two lamps in the temple of Teṉ-Tiruppūvaṇamuḍaiya-Mahādēva in Muḷḷi-nāḍu, a sub-division of Pāṇḍi-nāḍu.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṭantaiyuñ ceyamaṭantaiyum tiruppuyaṅkaḷil Iṉitiruppa Irunilamum perumai Eyti Eṇṭicaiyuṅ kuṭai niḻaṟṟa maṉṉavarellām
vantiṟaiñca marapilvaru maṇimuṭi cūṭit teṉkumariyum vaṭakaṅkaiyum tiraikkaṭale Ellai Ākap pārmuḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭan vaḷara (svasti) ma
ṉṉiya virasiṁhāsanattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya māmutal matik kulam viḷakkiya komutal koccaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīvallabha
devaṟku yāṇṭu 10 7Āvatu śrī pāṇṭināṭṭu muḷḷināṭṭut teṉ tiruppūvaṇamuṭaiya mahādevaṟku kuṭanāṭṭuk koṟkai(kkoṟkai) Uṭaiyāṉ kiḻavaṉ Appaṉāṉa śrīvallabhap pāṇ
ṭiyak koṉ Ittevaṟku vaitta tirunantāviḷakku Iraṇṭu cantirātittavaṟ celvatākat tirunantāviḷakku 1 ney Uḻakkākat tirunantāviḷak kiraṇṭukkum ney Urikkum viṭṭa cāvā muvāp perāṭu nūṟu ..
Digital edition of SII 14.240 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
